definition: country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)

sentences.english: Local Delivery service is not available to outlying islands and villages.
sentences.chinese: 本地送货不包括离岛及鄕村。

sentences.english: Finally, it gives a brief report on the future trends of rural settlement research in Germany.
sentences.chinese: 最后，并简述德国鄕聚落学未来发展的趋向。

definition: to attend (an official function)/to be present/to administer/to approach (esp. as administrator)
variant of 蒞|莅[li4], to attend
